meanings.definition: Following the resurrection of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The postresurrections celebration was filled with joy and hope.
meanings.sent2: The postresurrections process was a miraculous event.
meanings.sent3: The postresurrections party had everyone feeling grateful for new beginnings.
meanings.sent4: The postresurrections spirit lingered in the air, bringing a sense of renewal.
meanings.sent5: The postresurrections transformation was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The act of coming back to life after death.
meanings.sent1: The postresurrections of the ancient legend captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: The postresurrections of the hero in the story brought tears of joy.
meanings.sent3: The postresurrections of the cat startled the family but brought relief.
meanings.sent4: The postresurrections of the plant after winter amazed the gardener.
meanings.sent5: The postresurrections of the phoenix symbolized rebirth and hope.
